How to read faster: tips, techniques, exercises
07 Nov 2019, 13:00 by Irina Rogava
For a month, the leader of the YouTube channel Lifehacker, Irina Rogava, mastered the technique of speed reading. It turns out that reading a book a day is real!
At school, we were taught to read first letters, then syllables, and then combine words into whole sentences. It seemed enough: read it. We didn‚Äôt even think about increasing speed. And very in vain.



This article is part of the Lifehacker Grand Challenge. We came up with it so that you have the motivation to finally change your life. If you want to become the best version of yourself - join the Big Challenge, complete tasks and receive gifts. Every month we give iPhone XR, and we will also play a trip to Thailand for two.
